title: Boppin for Windows
content: [url=http://jenniverse.com/boppin%20main.html]Boppin[/url] is ported to Windows by the original programmer(s) and it's free!

title: Re: Boppin for Windows
content: Very nice looking graphics! I'll try this game.. Never heard of this before.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Boppin for Windows
content: So is it actually ported to Windows or it just works properly in a real DOS box?  (I don't have Windows so I can't test it.)

title: Re: Boppin for Windows
content:
It runs in windows now.

It is a great game, with a somewhat mystical storyline and challenging puzzels. A brilliant development!A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Boppin for Windows
content: [quote]Quote:[hr]Wow, I like that MIDI soundtrack Joe attached to his 2nd post![hr][/quote]I think the Boppin' music is cool too.
